original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business needs and technical implementation, requiring a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency. As a key member of the team, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business requirements and operate efficiently. Your primary focus will be on developing new processes and leveraging cutting-edge technologies, such as machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), to deliver innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate complex business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work collaboratively with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think critically and identify innovative solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in data analysis and visualization, with the ability to leverage various tools and techniques to uncover insights and drive process improvements

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language
- Expertise in SQL and database management, enabling you to efficiently query and manipulate data

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated experience in applying machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques to develop and implement effective solutions
- A track record of successfully translating business requirements into technical configurations and delivering high-quality, user-friendly systems

Preferred Experience:
- Knowledge of Agile methodologies and experience working in an Agile environment
- Familiarity with the vehicle configuration domain and its unique challenges and requirements

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] platform
- SQL and database management tools
- Data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI)
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder engagement
- Ability to work in an Agile, iterative development process, with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Willingness to stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies, and a proactive approach to professional development

Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business strategy and technical execution, requiring a unique blend of analytical thinking, technical expertise, and problem-solving skills. As a key member of the team, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring our vehicle configuration systems accurately reflect business needs and operate at optimal efficiency. Your primary focus will be on leveraging cutting-edge technologies, such as machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), to develop innovative solutions that drive process improvements and enhance the user experience.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand business requirements, gather detailed information, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate complex business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, utilizing tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data
- Propose and implement process enhancements and system optimizations through the strategic application of configuration changes and best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and seamless ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think critically and devise innovative solutions
- Strong communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in data analysis and visualization, with the ability to leverage various tools and techniques to uncover insights and drive process improvements

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language
- Expertise in SQL and database management, allowing you to efficiently query and manipulate data

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated success in applying machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques to develop and implement effective solutions
- A track record of translating business requirements into technical configurations and delivering high-quality, user-centric systems

Preferred Experience:
- Knowledge of Agile methodologies and experience working in an Agile environment
- Familiarity with the vehicle configuration domain and its unique challenges and requirements

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] platform
- SQL and database management tools
- Data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI)
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder engagement
- Ability to work in an Agile, iterative development process, with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Willingness to stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies, and a proactive approach to professional development

Role Overview:
This role is a unique opportunity to blend your technical expertise with strategic business acumen, playing a pivotal part in shaping the future of our vehicle configuration systems. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for translating complex business requirements into innovative technical solutions, leveraging cutting-edge technologies such as machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive process improvements and enhance the user experience. Your ability to bridge the gap between business needs and technical implementation will be instrumental in ensuring our systems accurately reflect the evolving demands of the market and operate at peak efficiency.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to deeply understand their business requirements, gather detailed information, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate complex business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for strategic process improvements, leveraging tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data
- Propose and implement innovative solutions through the strategic application of configuration changes and the integration of best practices, with a focus on streamlining business processes and enhancing system efficiency
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions and gather feedback
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and seamless ongoing support of system configurations, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and innovation

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think strategically and devise innovative, forward-looking solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences and build strong working relationships with stakeholders
- Proficiency in data analysis and visualization, with the ability to leverage various tools and techniques to uncover insights and drive data-driven decision-making

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language
- Expertise in SQL and database management, allowing you to efficiently query and manipulate data

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated success in applying machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques to develop and implement effective solutions that drive tangible business impact
- A track record of translating complex business requirements into technical configurations and delivering high-quality, user-centric systems that exceed expectations

Preferred Experience:
- Knowledge of Agile methodologies and experience working in an Agile environment
- Familiarity with the vehicle configuration domain and its unique challenges and requirements, with the ability to anticipate and address evolving market trends

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] platform
- SQL and database management tools
- Data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI)
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder engagement, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement
- Ability to work in an Agile, iterative development process, with a focus on delivering high-impact solutions that drive business value
- Willingness to stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies, and a proactive approach to professional development and thought leadership
